# exequte

Nodejs function to execute child process in promise style

## Usage

Use as in examples below:

### JavaScript Example

```javascript
var exec = require('exequte');

exec('git', ['help']).then(function(out){
	console.log(out);
}.fail(function(err){
	console.log err;
});
```

### CoffeeScript Example

```coffeescript
exec = require 'exequte'

exec('git', ['help'])
	.then (out) ->
		console.log out
	.fail (err) ->
		console.log err
```
